name: Subscribe2 Widget-hack
author: Ken Litscher

sections.description: This plugin is really just a widget to go along with the Subscribe2 plugin. There is a conflict with some plugins and the widget that comes with the Subscribe2 plugin due to the use of the-content(). See here. This widget does not use the-content(), but functions in the same exact way as the original widget.
sections.installation:
1. Upload subscribe2-widget-hack.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Ensure the Subscribe2 plugin is uploaded and activated
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Place the widget in your sidebar in the ‘Presentation’->’Widgets’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Why are there no Frequently Asked Questions?

I haven’t been frequently asked anything. It’s pretty straightforward. But if you have a question, please visit the homepage and leave a comment.

short_description: Creates a sidebar widget for the Subscribe2 plugin if you have other plugins that are incompatible with the original Subscribe2 widget.
description: This plugin is really just a widget to go along with the Subscribe2 plugin. There is a conflict with some plugins and the widget that comes with the Subscribe2 plugin due to the use of the-content(). See here. This widget does not use the-content(), but functions in the same exact way as the original widget.
